entry.tran: 抬出名人显要以提高身价;说出名人名字以抬高自己
entry.def: If you say that someone name-drops, you disapprove of them referring to famous people they have met in order to impress people.

example.ex: The assistant carried on talking to his mate, name-dropping all the famous riders he knew...
example.tran: 那位助手继续对同伴讲个不停，搬出他认识的所有知名自行车赛手。

example.ex: I must stop saying everyone famous is a good friend. It sounds as if I'm name-dropping.
example.tran: 我不能再说每位知名人士都是我的好朋友了，听起来像是我在借他们抬高自己。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
